title: 1878 Forbes Co. H804-6 Complete 6 Card Set
author: loubrown

posts.post_title: 1878 Forbes Co. H804-6 Complete 6 Card Set
posts.post_content:
Complete 6 Card Set of 1878 Forbes Co. H804-6 Vintage Baseball Cards. 5 Graded SGC 30 and 1 Graded SGC A.  Beautiful fronts with some staining on the backs.  $599 DLVD Either PP F/F or Credit Card.  

Thanks. Lou Brown

Lou have you sold these yet?
I know it’s been 3 years since you’ve posted.

Chad
